title: The All-Form

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You're three random other players. You have access to their private channels, and you may take actions for them. In the case of conflicting actions, a random one will be chosen.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure as many of the other players you are win as possible.

desc:
Post 335
*I am you! You are me! We're a happy singularity!*
